wikipedia_page.main: Herbert Henry  Harington (14 August 1868 – 1 January 1948) was British Army officer and amateur cricketer.

response: * Herbert Harington, English soldier and cricketer

Harington was born in Lucknow to Herbert Harington of the Oudh Commission. He studied at Malvern, and joined the  Welsh Regiment in 1888. In 1890 he joined the Indian Staff Corps and the 62nd Punjabis.
